banner.title: About the program
banner.description: This program focuses on Front-End development, emphasizing user interface (UI) programming and JavaScript programming language. JavaScript is indispensable for creating dynamic and interactive websites and is also widely used in other fields, such as server-side and mobile application development. During the training, you will gain theoretical knowledge and practical skills necessary for building functional and modern websites. You will master the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, learn to create responsive design pages, and make them accessible. You will work with advanced frameworks like React and Next.js. Additionally, you will explore artificial intelligence (AI) solutions that can optimise workflows and enhance productivity. The final project is a fully functional website that is hosted online, developed together with a team using Jira and GitHub. It will serve as evidence of your capabilities.

modules.title: Brief Introduction to Computer Science and Web Programming
modules.description: Fundamentals of computer science, principles of how the internet works, and the importance of web programming in the IT field. Frontend vs Backend and the composition of development teams. Installation and configuration of Integrated Development Environments (IDEs).

modules.title: HTML and CSS Fundamentals
modules.description: Syntax of HTML and CSS and their application in building websites. Key HTML elements, CSS application rules, browser tools, and other nuances. Utilization of AI tools for learning.

modules.title: Responsive Design Programming
modules.description: Using CSS Flexbox, Grid, and media queries to create responsive designs for various device screens. Mobile-first design approach.

modules.title: Accessibility for Web Pages (WCAG Standards)
modules.description: Application of WCAG and best practices for making user interfaces accessible to people with disabilities.

modules.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
modules.description: JavaScript syntax, variables, conditions, arrays, loops, functions, DOM manipulation, event handling, and creating dynamic website functionalities. Asynchronous JavaScript and using external APIs.

modules.title: Git Version Control and Terminal
modules.description: Using the terminal and its main functions. Git version control system: storage, history tracking, conflict resolution. Using GitHub for team collaboration and code reviews.

modules.title: React Fundamentals
modules.description: Introduction to JavaScript frameworks and ReactJS. Creating React components, using state, props, and hooks, as well as conditional and list rendering.

modules.title: Next.js Fundamentals
modules.description: Benefits and key features of Next.js. Server-Side vs Client-Side Rendering. Principles of routing and data management in Next.js.

modules.title: Domain Management and Website Hosting
modules.description: Acquiring and registering domains, DNS configuration, and website hosting using platforms like Vercel and Cloudflare.

modules.title: Project Work
modules.description: Team project that consolidates all acquired knowledge and skills, including design, planning, programming, hosting, and testing stages.

expectations.title: What to expect after the course?
expectations.description: You know the fundamentals of UX/UI design, can create interactive prototypes, and have a certificate to prove your skills.

cards.title: Flexibility

mentor.title: Meet your mentor
mentor.name: Gedas Gardauskas
mentor.role: Co-founder | Software engineer and Frontend mentor
mentor.description: Gedas is a co-founder of Unicamp and an experienced programmer with over 7 years of experience in the IT field. His areas of expertise include MLOps, GCP infrastructure, Node.js, React.js, and other technologies. Gedas has experience in developing text-to-speech (TTS) systems, managing AI model deployment processes, data warehouses, data processing systems, learning platforms, and BI tools. He created highly regarded JavaScript and Python programming programs used by CodeAcademy and FastTrack academies.
